entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Walkerton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:46 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.5°C

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
